=== Who am I ===
Hello! I'm Andrea Cimitan, a 24-year-old man from Italy. I do UI design, UX hacking and I write high quality code.
I'm a smart guy and I love precision. I adore smiling :-) I'm currently working for Canonical as a Software Engineer for the Desktop Experience Team.

=== Contributions ===
I've been involved for years in developing themes. I'm the author of the Murrine Gtk+ 2.0 engine and I've spent a lot of time refining Clearlooks. I've done Ambiance and Radiance for Maverick, and for Natty I'm working on Ayatana Overlay Scrollbars.

I've done much more of this, <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~cimi|launchpad]]</nowiki> is keeping a trace of it :-)
